application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x crab apple (T126): Fell 1 x London plane (T131): Lift low canopy - Highways clearance to 5.5 m over road.1 x London plane (T143): Lift low canopy - Specified extent to 3 m over garden footpath and 5.5 m over road. Also remove epicormic growth from stem.1 x hawthorn (T144): Fell1 x London plane (T158): Lift low canopy - Highways clearance to 5.5 m over road.1 x lime (T164): Reduce heavy branch weight by tip reducing the pollard, regrowth of the extended lateral limb to the northeast at 6 m over car parking by approximately 1.5 m. Final cuts to be no greater than 30 mm diameter, leaving furnishing growth to minimise visual impact. Also strip all epicormic growth from the base to 4 m to remove encroaching growth from the footpath and car parking, and lift the low canopy to 3.5 m over car parking.
